response.content:
{
  "step1": "Preheat oven to 350°F. Grease two 8-inch round pans. Line bottoms with parchment paper. Prepare ingredients: 2 ¾ cups flour, 1 ½ cups sugar, 2 teaspoons baking powder.",
  "step2": "In a large mixing bowl, whisk together flour, sugar, baking powder, and 1 teaspoon salt. In another bowl, whisk 1 cup milk, 2 large eggs, and 1 teaspoon vanilla extract.",
  "step3": "Melt 1 cup unsalted butter and 1 cup dark chocolate. Let cool slightly. Add to wet ingredients and whisk until combined. Pour into dry ingredients and mix until smooth.",
  "step4": "Divide batter evenly between prepared pans. Smooth tops. Bake for 25-30 minutes or until a toothpick inserted comes out clean. Let cool in pans for 5 minutes.",
  "step5": "Transfer cakes to a wire rack to cool completely. Once cool, prepare chocolate buttercream by beating 1 cup unsalted butter, 2 cups confectioners' sugar, and 1 cup melted dark chocolate.",
  "step6": "Assemble cake by spreading buttercream on one layer, placing the second layer on top, and frosting the outside with remaining buttercream. Decorate as desired with chocolate shavings or chopped nuts."
}
